notes: Major release: TOTP fix, security headers/CORS/rate limiting, password validation/reset/sessions, streaming pipeline (audio selection/subtitle burn-in/HDR-to-SDR/HEVC/hw decode), Telegram/Pushover/Gotify/email notifications, DLNA/SSDP/ContentDirectory/Chromecast bidirectional, full OpenAPI spec, pagination/ETag, ARIA accessibility, PWA enhancements, scanner hardening with symlink protection and concurrent processing.
